title: 客户端报错
author: 张钰灝
txt_content:
[13:07:16] [main/INFO]: Setting user: Tiamo_Warmth
[13:07:16] [main/INFO]: (Session ID is token:64595XXXXXX4816d05f07bXXXX6:6aaeeec711XXXXXXXcf37ceXXXX）
[13:07:16] [Client thread/INFO]: LWJGL Version: 2.9.1
[13:07:17] [Client thread/INFO]: Reloading ResourceManager: Default, BitBetter Ultra 2.7
[13:07:18] [Sound Library Loader/INFO]: Sound engine started
[13:07:23] [Client thread/INFO]: Created: 2048x1024 textures/blocks-atlas
[13:07:24] [Client thread/INFO]: Created: 256x256 textures/items-atlas
[13:07:26] [Client thread/INFO]: Stopping!
[XXX是代表正版UUID的代码我为了防止盗号，更换的]
我需要确认是什么原因导致出错，PS:资源包文件夹里并无资源包文件

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content: 自动关闭是吧，看看显卡驱动是不是有问题，还有，删除所有高清修复类mod

replies.author: LX神龙
replies.txt_content: 我感觉是你的硬盘有问题，也有可能是你mod发生冲突，删掉冲突mod就可以啦

replies.author: ningyinan18
replies.txt_content: 你删了重新解压就好了 希望采纳~

replies.author: 张钰灝
replies.txt_content:
ItIsEnderman 发表于 2017-6-11 17:02
自动关闭是吧，看看显卡驱动是不是有问题，还有，删除所有高清修复类mod
的确是高清修复的问题，把灵活移动删掉立马兼容，所以初步判断是灵活移动和高清修复版本不兼容
